1 Year Extended Warranty

from TPSTECH®
(683)
  • Lenovo's 1 Year Additional Warranty Extension Pack with Onsite Service. Please refer to the images for the laptop compatible models.
  • Lenovo's expert technicians will take care of your Laptop Problems through phone, chat, or email. Get the peace of mind and coverages for costly repairs with the convenience of in-home service. No hidden fees – you won’t pay a rupee in deductibles and fees warranty service.
  • Remote problem diagnosis and support included, replacement parts and materials included, escalation management and ccoversage for all Lenovo branded components. Optimize your investment by extending the manufacturer warranty and make your laptop last longer. Get back to business faster with onsite support within 48 business hours in case your issue is not resolved covers phone.
  • Email Delivery steps - After getting the activation code on your Amazon registered email id.
  • Declaration from the seller: To avail Lenovo’s warranty extension service, registration is required with the warranty activation service provider. You may be required to provide information about your purchase to the warranty activation service provider. Imported and Out of Warranty Devices are not eligible. Warranty service should be purchased along with the device or within 30 days of purchase of your Device.
Learn more

2 Year Extended Warranty

from TPSTECH®
(683)
  • Lenovo's 2 Year Additional Warranty Extension Pack (1 Year Default + 2 Year Additional Warranty) with Onsite Service. Please refer to the images for the laptop compatible models.
  • Lenovo's expert technicians will take care of your Laptop Problems through phone, chat, or email. Get the peace of mind and coverages for costly repairs with the convenience of in-home service. No hidden fees – you won’t pay a rupee in deductibles and fees warranty service.
  • Remote problem diagnosis and support included, replacement parts and materials included, escalation management and ccoversage for all Lenovo branded components. Optimize your investment by extending the manufacturer warranty and make your laptop last longer. Get back to business faster with onsite support within 48 business hours in case your issue is not resolved covers phone.
  • Email Delivery steps - After getting the activation code on your Amazon registered email id, Go to tpstech.in/activate and fill in the required details in the web form and submit the form to initiate activation. Benefits will reflect in Lenovo’s Internal Systems within 7 business days. After activation, the warranty extension will reflect on pcsupport.lenovo.com/in/en/warrantylookup#/
  • Declaration from the seller: To avail Lenovo’s warranty extension service, registration is required with the warranty activation service provider. You may be required to provide information about your purchase to the warranty activation service provider. Imported and Out of Warranty Devices are not eligible. Warranty service should be purchased along with the device or within 30 days of purchase of your Device. For Questions / Track Activation Request Status, contact seller @ 080 4718 8277.
Learn more

Quess Care Extended Warranty Plan for 2 Year for Laptop Between 100001 to 125000 (Email Delivery)

from Quesscare
(4)
  • Validity : Quess Care 2 Year Extended Warranty Plan is applicable for Laptop with 1 Year or 2 Year Manufacturing Warranty. Extended warranty starts from the date when the manufacturer’s warranty ends.
  • What's covered : Manufacturing defects in your product which is part of the original product brand warranty.
  • For your comfort : (a) Digital WhatsApp delivery within 10 days (b) Auto-Activation (c) Complimentary Pickup and Drop (d) Unlimited service requests.
  • Remain stress free : (a) File claims through Amazon (b) Brand authorized technicians and genuine parts (c) 15 days’ repair or replacement or refund up to sum insured value with Policy T&C, How to claim : 1 : Go to Your Orders - Get Product Support - File Claim. 2 : Go to quesscare.com - Enter your mobile number - file claim. 3 : Download - QUESSCare App - Enter your mobile number - file claim. 4 : Call 1-800-5721-144 for any support
  • Our Service Standards : 98.22% claim settlement ratio, 15 days to settle claims, 85% customer satisfaction. What's not covered : (a) damages (b) wear and tear (c) theft (d) accessories (e) anything that is not covered within the brand warranty. Disclaimer : This plan is auto-activated and valid only if purchased along with the product on Amazon, this plan cannot be exercised standalone.
Learn more

    About this item

    • Free upgrade to Windows 11 when available* Disclaimer-*The Windows 11 upgrade will be delivered late 2021 into 2022. Specific timing varies by device. Certain features require specific hardware.
    • Processor: 11th Gen Intel Core i7 - 11370H | Speed: 3.3 GHz (Base) - 4.8 GHz (Max) | 4 Cores | 8 Threads | 12MB Cache
    • Display: 15.6" FHD (1920x1080) | IPS Technology | 120 Hz Refresh Rate | 250Nits Brightness
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3050 4GB GDDR6 Dedicated Graphics with max TGP 90W | Boost Clock 1500/1740MHz
    • Memory and Storage: 8GB RAM DDR4-3200, Upgradable up to 16GB | 512GB SSD
    • Military Grade : IdeaPad Gaming 3 Series comes with MIL-STD-810G Qualified Design | Tested and qualified for various Military Specification Tests including Low & High Temperature (-25 to 63 degrees C for 4 hrs) | Temperature Shock (-25 to 63 degrees C one way temp Shock) | Shock (122cm+ Drop Test) | Vibration (4-32Hz over 2 hrs)
    • Cooling: 100%imporved ventilation rate | 21% larger thermal Area | 35% higher TDP
    • Operating System: Pre-Loaded Windows 10 Home with Lifetime Validity
    • Audio: 2 x 2W HD Stereo Speakers | Nahimic Audio with Surround Sound, Sound Tracker, Night Mode, Sound Sharing and Content Profiles Camera (Built-in): HD 720p with E-camera Shutter which acts as physical kill switch for 100% privacy protection | Integrated Dual Array Microphone
    • Keyboard: Full-size 4-Zone white Backlit legendary TrueStrike Keyboard with 100% Anti-Ghosting, Anti-Abrasion and Soft-Landing switches | 1.5 mm Key Travel | Large Arrow Keys | Large one piece Track Pad
